csv2pqt

TSload.DataFormat.csv2pqt(path: str, filename: str, process_function: Optional[Callable[[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame], None]] = None, **loader_args: any) → None[source]

Format a file from csv to pqt.

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path of the file.

  • filename (str) – Name of the file.

  • process_function (Callable[[pd.DataFrame]) – None] ) : Default is None. A function to processs the data

  • **loader_args (any) – Keyword arguments for the loader.
